trans-unit.source: Represents a grammar rule.
Use the SrgsRule class to create a new rule at run time or to modify a rule in an existing grammar stream or file at run time.
trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时创建新的规则或修改在运行时中的现有语法流或文件的规则，请使用 SrgsRule 类。

trans-unit.source: The words and phrases specified by SrgsRule objects in grammars defined by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instances limit the spoken input that the recognizer must be able to identify.
trans-unit.target: 单词和短语由在语法中所定义的 SrgsRule 对象指定<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>实例限制语音识别器必须能够识别的输入。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: An SrgsRule object specifies the sequence in which words and phrases must be spoken by ordering the objects that contain them.
trans-unit.target: SrgsRule 对象指定在其中的单词和短语必须要朗读通过排序包含它们的对象的序列。

trans-unit.source: Words and phrases within a rule are represented by objects such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> elements.
trans-unit.target: 单词和短语规则中的表示由对象如<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>元素。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property to access the collection of child objects that an SrgsRule object contains.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A>属性来访问的 SrgsRule 对象包含的子对象的集合。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether an SrgsRule can be specified in a rule reference from a rule in an external grammar by setting its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定是否可以通过将设置指定在从外部语法中的规则的规则引用 SrgsRule 其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not legal to define an SrgsRule that is empty or that contains only white space.
trans-unit.target: 它是不合法定义 SrgsRule，为空或，仅包含空格。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `rule` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: 此类表示`rule`World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 中定义的元素[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `rule` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [rule Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠 SRGS`rule`元素以及它支持通过 System.Speech，有关详细信息请参阅[规则元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/da67b4aa-0545-426a-a02f-1417b968021e)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> class and specifies the identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref>类并指定规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule.
id is .
id is empty.
id is not a proper rule identifier.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> class from an array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref>数组中的类<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule.
An array of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> elements.
id is .
elements is .
id is empty.
id is not a proper rule identifier.
Adds an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> to an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> object.

Typical additions to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object include <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects that specify what speakers can say.
trans-unit.target: 典型添<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象包括<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>指定发言人可以说的对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: A valid rule element must contain at least one piece of recognizable text or one rule reference.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效规则元素必须包含至少一种可识别的文本或一个规则引用。

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[创建语法使用 SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object may also contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> objects that add semantic values and semantic keys to the rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象也可能包含<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>向规则添加语义值和语义的键的对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engine will return the semantic information, as well as the recognized phrase, when it recognizes the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别引擎将返回的语义信息，以及所识别的短语时它可以识别的短语。

trans-unit.source: See [Semantic Interpretation Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2e115391-73b3-4666-8fd1-540c529de3b0) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[语义解释标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2e115391-73b3-4666-8fd1-540c529de3b0)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that inherits from <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> and specifies what can be recognized.
trans-unit.target: 从继承的对象<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"> </xref> ，并指定可以识别的新增功能。

trans-unit.source: element is .
This property is not currently supported.
Not supported.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The elements in an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object can consist of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> objects.
trans-unit.target: 中的元素<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象可以包含<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The collection of elements in the rule.
Gets or sets the identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the rule.
An attempt is made to set Id to an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 Id 设置为无效值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
Not supported.
This property is not currently supported.
Not supported.
This property is not currently supported.
Not supported.
This property is not currently supported.
Not supported.
Gets or sets whether a rule can be activated for recognition and when the rule can be referenced by other rules.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否可以激活规则，用于识别和规则可以引用的其他规则。

trans-unit.source: The default value for scope is `Private`.
A private rule can only be activated for recognition by a rule reference from the root rule in its containing grammar or from another rule that is referenced from the root rule.
trans-unit.target: 私有规则仅可以识别通过从其包含的语法中的根规则或从根规则引用的另一个规则的规则引用激活。

trans-unit.source: A private rule cannot be referenced by an external grammar, unless the private rule is declared as the root rule of its containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: 不能由外部的语法，引用专用的规则，除非私有规则被声明为其包含的语法的根规则。

trans-unit.source: If its scope is set to `Public`, an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object can be activated for recognition by a reference from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> object in the containing grammar or from a rule in an external grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果其作用域设置为`Public`、<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>对象可以通过从引用激活进行识别<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>对象在包含语法或从外部语法中的规则。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: A value the sets the scope for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 一个值设置规则的作用域。

trans-unit.source: This property is not currently supported.
Not supported.
